To defend myself against the creatures of this planet, I need to develop more advanced weaponry and repurpose my lasers. This would allow me to maintain a safe distance from my enemies.
High-energy laser pulses can hit and kill enemies using no ammunition - only neon energy.
However my lasers need to be quite advanced to manage this feat (Production 3 required).
Note: New researchables available in "Production", "Tools", and "Space Travel".
